trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Fairbanks
There were no other sightings in Fairbanks on or around July 15th 2003
Summary: with the afternoon sun slightly behind me the object(orb) went from north to south and disappeared from view in about 5 seonds. there was no sound, or vapor trail. I said to my foreman, ''what is that ?''and before he could turn around it was gone
divs: Sighting Detailsit was slightly below top dead center so I could see up one side a little and it was just a shiny round ball. the sun was bright, no clouds at all and it was reflecting the sun like a mirror. I cannot say how high it was or how large it was but it was unlike anything I've seen before. there is no doubt in my mind itwas extraterestrial.there's nothing made by man like it. my foreman was talking to me and the sun was slightly behind us.I saw the object come over the horizon from the north and it went straight to the south and disappeared over the horizonto the south. I said to my foreman, "what is that?" and before he could turn around it was gone. to this day I'm still kind of in shock
